item.title: New Container: Cura
item.description: We have released a new container for UltiMaker Cura! UltiMaker Cura is free, easy-to-use 3D printing software trusted by millions of users. Fine-tune your 3D model with 400+ settings for the best slicing and printing results.
item.content:
We have released a new container for UltiMaker Cura!

UltiMaker Cura is free, easy-to-use 3D printing software trusted by millions of users. Fine-tune your 3D model with 400+ settings for the best slicing and printing results.
